roleset.name: allocate too much money to some purpose
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: adjectival with arg2
example.text: My initial thought is many posters on this site believe -LRB- as I tend to -RRB- this is a sign of an overbearing superpower that abuses its influence and over budgeted military spending to exert influence over international economies and policies .

example.name: all args
example.text: This comforted my dad until we found out a month later that they over budgeted his upgrades by roughly $6,000.
